video.name: VEGAN ZUCCHINI BREAD 1 BOWL | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Hearty Vegan Zucchini Bread with Chia seeds and Chocolate chips. 1 Bowl. GF option
ðŸ’™ FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/06/vegan-zucchini-bread-recipe.html
ðŸ’™ MY COOKBOOKS: https://veganricha.com/mybooks

The abundance of summer squash around means a lot of grilled veggies, minestrone, shredded zucchini fritters, zucchini sloppy lentils and more ways to use them up. 

This zucchini bread is another popular loaf to add to the repository. With chia seeds for additional nutrition, these soft, moist, delicious slices make a for a great breakfast or snack. Add nuts, other toasted seeds and dried fruit for a hearty breakfast loaf. For Gluten-free try this GF Zucchini Loaf. https://www.veganricha.com/2016/08/vegan-gluten-free-zucchini-bread-recipe.html

This is a nutfree Recipe. Add some walnuts or other nuts for variation. Vegan Nutfree Recipe.

recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup non dairy milk (, such as almond milk, soy milk)
1/3 cup raw sugar or light brown sugar or coconut sugar (, 1-2 tbsp more for sweeter)
1.5 cups flour ((I use 1 cup unbleached all purpose and 1/2 cup wheat))
1 cup shredded zucchini (, squeezed between paper towels to remove excess moisture)
1/3 cup chocolate chips (, plus more for topping)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 365 deg F (190 C), line a loaf pan with parchment or grease well. Mix non dairy milk and chia seeds in a large bowl and let sit for 10 mins. Then whisk in the rest of the wet ingredients until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 365 deg F (190 C), line a loaf pan with parchment or grease well. Mix non dairy milk and chia seeds in a large bowl and let sit for 10 mins. Then whisk in the rest of the wet ingredients until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in the zucchini. Add the dry ingredients (start with 1.25 cups flour if using  more whole grain flour, and more a tbsp at a time), and mix to make a thick muffin like batter. Fold in the chocolate chips (and 1/4 cup chopped nuts if using). ( If omitting the chia seeds from the wet, you will need a bit more flour to get the thick batter).
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in the zucchini. Add the dry ingredients (start with 1.25 cups flour if using  more whole grain flour, and more a tbsp at a time), and mix to make a thick muffin like batter. Fold in the chocolate chips (and 1/4 cup chopped nuts if using). ( If omitting the chia seeds from the wet, you will need a bit more flour to get the thick batter).

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle 1 tbsp chocolate chips on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle 1 tbsp chocolate chips on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 365 degrees F (190 deg C) for 55 to 65 minutes or until a toothpick comes out almost clean from the center. (baking time will depend on the moisture content of the zucchini and the batter) . For a gluten-free bread, see GF Zucchini Loaf
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 365 degrees F (190 deg C) for 55 to 65 minutes or until a toothpick comes out almost clean from the center. (baking time will depend on the moisture content of the zucchini and the batter) . For a gluten-free bread, see GF Zucchini Loaf
